verbose_text: Three primary MAPK families have been widely characterized : the ERK1/2 pathway, the C-Jun N-terminal kinase / stress activated protein kinase (JNK / SAPK) pathway, and the p38 kinase pathway.
evidence: ERK1/2 pathway, the C-Jun N-terminal kinase/stress-activated protein kinase (JNK/SAPK) pathway, and the p38
